Title: Requires group health plans and health insurance issuers to cover costs for scalp hair prosthesis worn for certain hair loss
Summary: Requires group health plans and health insurance issuers to cover costs for scalp hair prostheses worn for hair loss suffered as a result of alopecia areata, alopecia totalis or alopecia universalis.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring certain health insurance policies to cover costs for scalp hair prosthesis worn for hair loss suffered as a result of alopecia areata, alopecia totalis or alopecia universalis
